package.description:
This sample ROS node is actually a Webots robot controller that launches the ROS joy node and subscribes to its 'joy' topic to read the input from a joystick. This input is used to drive a simulated robot in Webots.
It is a good starting point to implement an interface between Webots and ROS for controlling simulated robots in Webots from ROS nodes.
package.author: Andreas Breitenmoser
